website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, easy-to-use front/rear car camera. Delivers very good daylight video at a great price.
pros: Sturdy build with nicely set front/rear cameras, but attaches easily to windshield
cons: backseat conversations are garbled, especially with radio interference
Instruction manual is difficult to follow
Camera doesn’t work well in low light

customer_reviews.title: Had issues... then the company responded quickly to fix the problem.  Very Impressed now with their customer service.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After having issues with the product... the company was VERY helpful and responsive in helping resolve the issues. They offered to send a replacement and upgraded it as well for my troubles. Had some troubles communicating through the Amazon platform... but when I contacted them directly they were extremely kind and helpful and have followed up to be sure everything is working right on my new model. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: At the given price point, this is a good camera. I initially had some issues but within a couple of days I was contacted by Pruveeo support and I must say that I am thoroughly impressed with the level of service I received. They were genuinely concerned about the performance of my camera and helped to improve my experience. Based upon my experience, I would recommend buying this camera or any other from Pruveeo.
customer_reviews.author: Dave and Colleen

customer_reviews.title: I did have a problem with it not looping after the sim card was full but the vendor in China was very responsive on helping me d
customer_reviews.text: This camera works very well. I did have a problem with it not looping after the sim card was full but the vendor in China was very responsive on helping me determine if I had bad settings. I would definitely buy another product from this vendor because of the positive customer response. I actually have already purchased a second unit.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Noel

customer_reviews.title: Grrat for an Uber or Lyft driver
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this three stars because you can't read any of the buttons and I bought this for a permanent mounting, but what good are the sticky pads if there is no flat mount? It only comes with the suction cup mount, which I didn't want. Customer service contacted me and made an adjustment for the inconvenience which was above and beyond, so I'm changing it to five stars. The cameras work very well, even in low light. I am very satisfied with the camera even though I still haven't figured out how to set the clock :-)
customer_reviews.author: Rich F

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing dash cam with dual lens!!!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing dash cam with dual lens!!! Great build quality and it's very easy to setup. The video quality is pretty good for 720p, but of course it'll be better if it came with 1080p. For price this low, can't really complain much. The audio quality is loud and clear, so no complain there. The dual lens came in very handy, especially if you're a Uber driver. Probably the only downside is that it doesn't come with wifi connection. You've to take out the memory card to view the recorded video. Otherwise, it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Bao

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a week. Screen does not come up and I wrote to customer support and they did not respond.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: An excellent dash cam with good PTZ set options for the ...
customer_reviews.text: An excellent dash cam with good PTZ set options for the cameras. I had set this camera as a rear camera to capture a very wide view of the traffic behind me. Unfortunately, there is no option to set both cameras to the same resolution (at the lower setting) and record two split views on equal settings. If both cameras could record at 640p standard resolution, this would have been ideal for my uses. Not at all a bad dash cam, but there is better. I got this because it has two camera heads, and the camera heads can be raised/lowered and set horizontally as well.
customer_reviews.author: Boaster

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture is great and would be easy to install except the knob the adds pressure to the suction cup broke, and now Im not able to mount the camera, so Im stuck with a product i cant use ++++ UPDATE++++ fixed suction cup issue, partly my error, everything works great now, and the camea has come in handy a few times. Updating my rating as well
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Check ASAP.
customer_reviews.text: Check your camera immediately. I had 2 originally and liked them. I order 2 others in December and am just getting the chance to put them in. Basically, I’m screwed. Past time for return and records and video is upside-down. I was emailed by the company about the reversal. I did and the camera view did as well. That’s ok. I had suction cups from the first one and it’s fine. I’m going to order 2 more anyway. Will look to see if I can get the first series I liked.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Get the correct SD card or you can't record
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this camera, I couldn't get the sd card to format correctly. I contacted support and Jimmy at Pruveeo promptly sent out another camera free of charge. Unfortunately I had the same issue with the new cam. I looked up the Pruveeo website and found they recommended a particular type of sd card. Once I put in a SanDisk UltraPlus Micro SDHC 32gb class 10 memory card, it worked like a charm. Can't beat the price for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that in this price range to get such a high quality camera. I wish it had a little bit better night vision but as a Lyft driver I found it perfect or what I do. So many customers, and how cool it is also. It's also going to help me get out of an unjust ticket because it captured the fact that I didn't do what the cop said and I'll be taking that to court with me. Booyah 100% recommend this for everyone to have in their car.
customer_reviews.author: Dannie

customer_reviews.title: Camera stopped working after a week
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this dash camera for about a week and it stopped working. When I turn it on, the screen is just blank. I should have believed the other reviews stating that this camera is cheap and doesn’t last long. Do NOT purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Taboo

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Can't deny that the reason I got this and am rating this well is because of the dual camera function where I can record inside as well. I got this for my brother in law since he's an uber driver. And you just never know these days. The build is a bit cheap but still looks good so far. Overall the size is great as it isn't too big. The cable that comes with it is REALLY long. I doubt you'll need to purchase an extension.
customer_reviews.author: Myrjam Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Image upside down? Read this.
customer_reviews.text: So many reviewers complain that they got a defective product because the images are upside down. Sorry, but these people are pretty dumb. The cameras rotate 360 on X axis and 180+ degrees on Y axis. They just need to rotate the cameras 180 on X and 180 on Y to flip the images.
customer_reviews.author: Flibberhibbit

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Now a days we really need a dash cam that way we have an evidence just in case we get into an accident and this product is awesome affordable and you won’t regret if you have a problem with your product Pruveeo is happy to help you like what they did to me i’m really satisfied...Thank you Pruveeo for an awesome product and awesome customer service...Thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: gerald

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this dash cam at all. After 18 months cam died for no reason
customer_reviews.text: I learned my lesson on purchasing a lower cost dash cam. It lasted around 18 months until it died. I would not recommend this at all. I removed this cam in extreme temps and it work adequately for me until a few days ago.. I started my car normally and looked up at the cam. All of the lights were on with no picture display. I attempted to reset it is following the instructions in the manual. I left it unplugged hoping to drain whatever on board battery it had to assist in the reset. Nothing I have done work. I am very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Coates

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10 * product hot cold dosnt matter
customer_reviews.text: This caught me off guard the picture quality is perfect I bought the hard Warrior kit is mounted in 4 different vehicles it turns on with the vehicle never has an issue and I ordered the recommended SD card although them of rain perfect even in negative temperatures. This is the one you want cameras are fully adjustable and we also had noticed with the police that they are a lot more cautious. I would only say that thing to make it perfect would be adding a speedometer
customer_reviews.author: zack ellis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SELLER GREAT PRODUCTS ****WOW****5 STAR
customer_reviews.text: SUPER CUSTOMER SERVICE . GREAT PRODUCT . HIGH QUALITY AND GREAT VALUE . I HIGHLY RECOMMEND . I BOUGHT SEVERAL CAMERAS FOR MY VEHICLES WORKING FLAWLESSLY . HOW MUCH BETTER DOES IT GET . SELLER RESPONDED MY QUESTIONS QUICKLY . A PLUS 5 STAR ALL THE WAY. KEEP UP THE GREAT WORK . I WILL KEEP BUYING FROM YOU
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Neither have taken responsibility
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product for about 9 months. Then it malfunctioned, it stopped recording and showed a blue screen with options for choosing camera or something else. I bought the insurance from asurion. Between these 2 orders and phone calls and messages I'm still without a camera and loss of money I could've used to feed my children.
customer_reviews.author: KittyKat

customer_reviews.title: IDK if it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is good, however it contually asks me to format my SD card and it does not say how to veiw back the footage as well. The camera does not stay on the mount very good either but as far as quility goes it's a good camera it sees alot. If I could figure out how to get it to stay on the mount and format the card and figure out how to download or view the footage it would be awesome oh and it does not have anytype of battery life if it's not hooked up to a continuous source of power it will turn off
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of use a constant error screen reads, insert SD card or format SD card when there is already an SD card in the slot and it will not record anymore. The picture still comes on but it will not record
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this, especially for the price. Easy to set up and use, super small and light weiight, with surprisingly great resolution. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julsie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good dash cam
customer_reviews.text: The product would not stay charged the charger was not securely put together and came apart. I'm yet to receive my refund I spend lots of money with Amazon going to look for other options like Walmart.com
customer_reviews.author: MrWarrenC

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Must say this company provides amazing customer service. I had an issue with a purchase of a dash camera and they went above and beyond to make sure I will be happy. My new product arrived as the other one must of had some issue and I am extremely happy with my device. Video quality is great and for the price the offer, it’s a true score
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: image is not good and the inside camera​ at night time is not light
customer_reviews.author: Angel grande

customer_reviews.title: Slight Problem but Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. The left camera on both units began flashing pink bars across the screens. Customer service was quick to respond with helpful hints and when those didn't work, quickly replaced both cameras. The video is excellent and very clear. You just can't beat these cameras for the price. I would definitely buy them again. Again, Pruveeo USA's customer service is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Old RN Guy

customer_reviews.title: Budget Dashcam
customer_reviews.text: Its simply a budget dashcam. Nothing spectacular or extremely bad about it. Wouldn't recommend it especially at night. Night vision is non existent. Save yourself some money buy a better one and do your research before purchasing as when I bought this one I returned it within a few days after receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: aimendoza4

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT for Uber/Lyft!
customer_reviews.text: I drive part time, and this is great. You can turn the sound off or on to remain compliant with recording laws (depending on your State). Very clear picture for the price!
customer_reviews.author: M.Brock

customer_reviews.title: it works, the image is clear, you can ...
customer_reviews.text: it works, the image is clear, you can see in both directions. I guess my only problem is the loop recording in the camera. Its only 3 minutes, I wish it could be at least 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price point. Video quality is solid. Actual camera looks good in car and is fairly easy to mount and dismount when exiting the vehicle (so you don’t leave the camera in the hot car). I wish there were an option for an external battery or the ability to charge it, because the cord is quite bothersome going from my out put to the windshield. Other than the aesthetic complaint with the charging cable, I have no real complaints. I’d definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: duke

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a quality camera with clear pictures and a dual camera - for the money this is the best! Make sure you purchase the suction cup mount ($5.99) on Amazon and a micro SD card. This camera offers piece of mind while ride sharing or driving in traffic. The best witness you can ever have!
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it if you want it to last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for two cars less than a year ago. As of right now, neither one works. Both tell me to format the card, and then refuse to do it, or pretend to do it, but then won't record. It is an infinite loop. I bought these hoping they would last more than a year. All I have now is frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its got really incredible video quality for such an inexpensive unit. Intuitive controls make setup and use very easy. It wont work long on its internal rechargable battery, but it comes with cords etc to get it wired to power.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bowman

customer_reviews.title: This dash cam is great! The camera quality is perfect for both daytime ...
customer_reviews.text: This dash cam is great! The camera quality is perfect for both daytime and nighttime. It’s also nice that there’s dual lens so I can also record what’s going on inside the car as well as outside. Instructions and usage are also very simple to learn. Overall a highly recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: KZ1221

customer_reviews.title: Everything works, but points to improve: (1) the ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything works, but points to improve: (1) the camera facing interior of my car can see nothing at all during night driving, so infra-red LED lights need to be added. (2) If the device can be hidden in a toy, then i do not need to take it off when not driving, otherwise thief may break car windows to steal it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Hao

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: For the price this a great buy. It is not going to give you super high quality video, but that's not why I bought it. It's easy to use. Perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff East

customer_reviews.title: Not batter
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with my sd card even after formating. Is not battery powered so if the cord unplug the whole thing needs to be rebooted
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: Works, but is finicky
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but gets a bit finicky with the cards after only a couple months. Sometimes the cards will fill, and instead of deleting the oldest files and continuing, the camera won't record until you format the card.
customer_reviews.author: A. Therrien

customer_reviews.title: Great Dash Cam for an amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of this product but after receiving it I was very pleasantly surprised just how easy to use it was and the great audio and video quality I received. After several months of use, it is still going strong. I would recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive dash cam.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: White screen ALL the time
customer_reviews.text: Edited: customer service is great! They tried they’re best to help to resolve the problem, even sent me replacements. Everything else are fine but the screen ALWAYS go white screen and I had to restarted it which is super annoying because either I have to pull over my car to do it or ask someone beside me to do it. I think this is a manufacture defect.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Gao

customer_reviews.title: The video quality is very good, all in all
customer_reviews.text: This is a funcy dash cam with dual cameras. The set up is little complicated than the regular dash camera, but it not took me to long to figure out all the functions. The camera can turned in any angles, I have used as a wide lens. The video quality is very good, all in all, it is a good dash camera. The only things you should aware that the charge come with original car charger, not USB charger, you’d better to purchase a car charger adapter in to to charge your other device.
customer_reviews.author: jojo_lei

customer_reviews.title: Passable
customer_reviews.text: If smartphones can have insanely great quality cameras why couldn't dashcams. If this had GPS connectivity and could link to my phone this would have been even better. And if this had higher storage support and longer recording times then that would've been the cherry on top
customer_reviews.author: Ramiche B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: one of the worts cameras out there. Dont be fooled by its coming with two cams. id rather have a 1 good quality cam than a two bad cams. Cam quality is very bad. It says 720 but its not more than 480. Night vision is terrible. Hard case is very cheap material. The most important is “it does not override your old vids!!!” you have to manually delete the card every time it gets full
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good camera for the price. I've been using it for over a month now and it works good. The only issue I have is how bad the quality is at night. I also wanted to add a note for the users having issues with the screen image being upside down. The easiest way to fix this is point the left camera (when mounted) towards you, then rotate the ball only, not the entire shaft. I hope that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT VALENCIANO

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great, easy mounting. The sd card that came with it was bad do I had to replace it but already has a few so no problem. The camera that faces into the car is black and white and fuzzy for a few minutes when first turning it on but starts working fine after a few minutes. I'm an Uber driver and I have recommended this to other drivers.
customer_reviews.author: srh

customer_reviews.title: And the camera quality is amazing! I highly recommend purchasing 1 if not 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been in 2 accidents since the purchase of my first dash cam; and after the second wreck, i decided to get one for the back window. I was able to provide my insurance company & lawyer with this footage when the other driver denied fault. And the camera quality is amazing! I highly recommend purchasing 1 if not 2 of these dash cams! 👍🏽😊
customer_reviews.author: Quency Bonds

customer_reviews.title: At beginning work fine and then few weeks later start to fall from ...
customer_reviews.text: Just want to review this camera. i got it little more than month ago . At beginning work fine and then few weeks later start to fall from windshield. record for 3-5min and then total shuts down i need manually turn button on. later few days started to say can't recognize memory card and not recording anything at all.I got this double cam for my teenager kid and getting noting out of it.Not happy with a product i got another cam from costco very happy little more money but its worth it every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product for my driving business. You buy the camera then you buy a sd card. Screen is too small. Didn't capture what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dash cam. I drive for Lyft and wanted a way to protect both the riders and myself. After getting the camera, set-up was so easy. When I had a problem, customer service never hesitated to help, and make sure that my problem was fixed, and that I was completely satisfied. If you want a great camera, with great customer service, then definitely get the Pruveeo MX2 dual camera dash cam!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rusty R.

customer_reviews.title: I like that this is a small unit
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a small unit. Did not like that the suction cup does not stick to most window surfaces in my vehicle. Dislike the location of the plug to the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tindell

customer_reviews.title: Nice dash cam for the value.  It could be a great cam with minor changes.
customer_reviews.text: Top 45 degree angled controls limits mounting positions along the roofline. Only handles 32MB microSD and records in memory hogging AVI format. Wait for the version that can handle 64MB microSD or larger and records in space efficient MP4. Wireless transfers of saved (locked) files to a smart phone or laptop would be of a great convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Camera on one side was broken right out of the box. Sent it back and got a different model.
customer_reviews.author: M. Couchman

customer_reviews.title: the camera itself is great. Decent recording front and back
customer_reviews.text: Other than the suction cup not sticking to my windshield, the camera itself is great. Decent recording front and back. Easy to use. There are better cameras, but for the price about as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great so far...
customer_reviews.text: Great so far... Giving 4 stars because instruction is somewhat vague. But otherwise seems a quality product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Muleskinner

customer_reviews.title: Small and unobstrusive
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cameras. Purchased for both me and my wife's autos. Small, unobtrusive...and they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Using it everyday. Work out very well. A recommended product
customer_reviews.author: BAILIANG C.

customer_reviews.title: Camera for auto
customer_reviews.text: Like product for the price. Inside me truck for 2 year no problem
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get video to record on both cameras. Very poor sound and video quality.
customer_reviews.author: MrB

customer_reviews.title: To think of !!! for a extra fee the sd card would have Ben appreciate.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for it's ok, it's use in the car, for commercial use, I also bought a Papago S36 no comparison yours does the work. And also it would have Ben appreciated if and SD card came with it reddy for the go had to run at the store the next day for a 32 sd card. Some to think of ??? As for the delivery and service +10 star great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesking

customer_reviews.title: Very good considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Really like it but 2 issues that I faced using it 1.the display on the device changed it is not the same as the taken video it has some whiteness that 2.the suction cup is not good against heat when left in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: AMMARZE

customer_reviews.title: I like the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the price, the ability to loop the recording and the on/ off when the care is started or stopped. It doesn't have good night view on the rear cam, I am a Lyft driver and like the safety of have a view of my back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Braunwynn Franklin

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I guess the camera it's ok for the price but I hate the thing of my memory card gets full so quick something that it seems weird to me because I usually had that same memory card on my rexing dash cam and it wasn't doing that, I had that memory card recording on mother rexing dash cam for a month and it wasn't giving me any memory card full message at all. Kinda sucks though but oh well I guess the price is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: 5 star!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with Pruveeo’s customer service and support!
customer_reviews.author: Batang Quiapo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It came without the suction cup and the memory card wont click in. We are sending bitht the original one back and the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This car camera is very good! I ueses about 4 weeks running well. Have two cameras can capture anywhere and video clarity 720p. Powerful and cheap, that's what I want
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good price, no SIM card, learning curve
customer_reviews.text: Pain to learn to use and difficult to see what the buttons are. Does not come with SIM card, so add one to your order.
customer_reviews.author: Signtalk

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the windshield mount that comes with the device. Instructions for set up were a little confusing but once figured out set up went easy. Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randall S. Macey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works well really only complaint it doesn't have a longer record time the most it records before going to a new video is a minute I would like a 5 min option but oh well does it s job well
customer_reviews.author: Alex D

customer_reviews.title: True price $49.00 no MFG web site
customer_reviews.text: Windshield hold a joke it fly off right turns now no screen. But i wanted side to side video due to being shot at from the side window.
customer_reviews.author: A Martin

customer_reviews.title: perfect for that unwanted recording of road accidents
customer_reviews.text: I'm updated my previous review. It works good. And I like the double lens that shows both front and rear view.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Ray

customer_reviews.title: Mount broke in first month
customer_reviews.text: After 11 months it just died. Also the plastic mount broke within a month and I had to repair to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Sperline

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesme
customer_reviews.text: Great price, on a dual camera Dash Cam. Love this thing. Easy to use, good video quality.
customer_reviews.author: zBrendon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last for long time...
customer_reviews.text: After weeks of uses started showing blank screen and it stop recording. I need to hard reset it every couple of car start so I guess I can say it miss its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Idan A.

customer_reviews.title: The dash cam is great let’s you record what your car sees to review ...
customer_reviews.text: The dash cam is great let’s you record what your car sees to review later. Good for insurance purposes. Video quality is good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The interface is user friendly and extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom and put in her mini Van. She loves it so much ! The interface is user friendly and extremely easy to use . The quality of video is good and definitely worth the price. I m planning to buy 2 more sets as a gift !
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Have used daily, for hours at a time. Picture and sound quality is great. Have had no problems!
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed form factor, but stupid low memory limit 32 gig? WHY?!
customer_reviews.text: This cam has the best adjustable swivel dual camera. Love the form factor design for many angles and scenarios for cam recording. BUT STUPID LOW MEM CARD LIMIT OF ONLY 32Gig. Why the low limit?! Should be at least 128 Gig due to high resolution recording for day long driving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to operate
customer_reviews.text: Complicated operation compared to others in market.. never used it, just bought another. Wish I would have returned it. The NEXAR I bought after this is fully automatic whenever car is turned on auto connects and sends all info to cloud an has many desirable features
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, fast delivery & cool gadget
customer_reviews.text: Outside picture & video is wide enough to cover any details. Color resolution could be improved. Inside video looks black & white while recording. Mounting bracket & suction base work well in low temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ricardo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Value on an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Excellent picture!! I was impressed for the price. Expected a LOT less for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: I think that it's a fair price for this great camera. It's easy to install and use, video looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Liran

customer_reviews.title: I like the unit but it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit but it stopped working. It said the sd card was full. It wasn't because I took it to my computer and formatted it. Put it back in and it said full again in less than 1 min. Does this mean the card is bad or the camera?
customer_reviews.author: Jack Barringer

customer_reviews.title: The right tool to keep your rights
customer_reviews.text: Loved it . It works when i start my car and record every thing tou can pkay back when ever you want
customer_reviews.author: Dhoom

customer_reviews.title: Great little dash cam!
customer_reviews.text: Great little dash camera for the price. Inside camera doesn’t work too well at night unless well lit inside. Outside camera does all right at night. The blinking blue lights are a bit of a distraction while driving at night. Overall for the price great camera.
customer_reviews.author: James Jewett

customer_reviews.title: Wish there is an alternative
customer_reviews.text: I bought this several months ago. I have not been able to use it that much cos it kept falling off from its stand and I cannot use it and charge my phone at the same time due to the type of power cable. Apart from the above mentioned concerns, I believe it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ikechukwu C. Alex Nwakanma

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but it makes one minute videos of the whole time it's recording, the video is very clear! I am happy with this camera
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Does not auto loop ... Annoying Formatting Card
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is Ok but It does not auto loop record. I purchased two of them and both did same. It is so annoying that I have to format the memory card every 2/3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Govinda

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, I recommend it, I purchase one for my charger that cost me almost $200.00 And the MX2 Dash Cam has everything and more, if I would have known about this dash cam before I would have purchase two for my vehicles. EXELENT PRODUCT BUY IT YPU WONT REGRET IT.
customer_reviews.author: Mario M.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Works Great, awesome camera. Originally I got another dash camera from PRUVEEO and it was dead on delivery so I returned it and got this one.
customer_reviews.author: WWong

customer_reviews.title: When you choose the option to"buy it again" you might not get exactly what you previously bought
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with the window suction component like the first one I order!! When I clicked on the " buy it again option " I assumed I would get exactly what I ordered the first time. Sadly I did not and now I have to return it. :(
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Too big of a charger I was expecting an usb
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this product 3 stars because the charger is huge and I am an uber driver I need my charger outlet. Still not sure if I will keep it
customer_reviews.author: Delia30

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Company!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but turned out not what I needed. The company helped me get exactly what I needed! Best customer experience I have ever had! I recommend them to all my Uber and Lyft drivers!
customer_reviews.author: Drew P. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Mounting hardware is extra but why?
customer_reviews.text: Camare came as promised but why do you sell a camera with out the mounting hardware? That is the only problem I had with this order and I bought two and have bought three all together and the first one came as expected. Why would it not come complete?
customer_reviews.author: lester landes

customer_reviews.title: Should be high def video
customer_reviews.text: Really a five for the price but in an hd world their video is not very good
customer_reviews.author: AmazingAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Seller made things right.
customer_reviews.text: This dash cam worked fine but the sd card holder broke with the 3rd reinsert attempt. I'm sure this is not common and I got a lemon. The seller is honest and will work to customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Oren Palomares

customer_reviews.title: Omg, the best, ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Love it! Uses only a 32 gb or less mini card only.
customer_reviews.author: moeinseattle

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for rideshare
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use when driving Uber. Unfortunately it only supports about 2 hours of recording before you have to either insert a new sd card or reformat. Not ideal for full days of driving.
customer_reviews.author: BNolan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and set up!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and set up. I like the dual camera feature the most. It’s easy to see where the cameras are pointing. The quality is moderate. Can be hard to see at night time but it does not have night vision features. Good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison W.

customer_reviews.title: Love but kept falling off windshield
customer_reviews.text: When I revived the item it only came with one sticker which made it hard for the camera to stick. Everything else was good
customer_reviews.author: Taj

customer_reviews.title: For safety this is the product to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I feel like I have added protection both front and rear for my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

product_meta.title: Pruveeo MX2 Dash Cam Front and Rear Dual Camera for Cars, 240 Degree Wide Angle Driving Recorder DVR
feature_bullets: 320-degree rotating 120-degree viewing angle high-resolution wide-angle lens. 720P & 480P resolution at 30 fps with AVI format.
Discreet Design. The camera mounts to the windshield, staying concealed from outside the car.

Dash-cam works automatically. It starts recording when the engine is turned on and stops when it is turned off. Loop Interval Recording to micro SD Card. The seamless recording means no gaps between recorded files.
Pruveeo is a professional dash-cam manufacturer. Established in 2000, it employs over 300 people. It provides OEM and ODM services for numerous famous brands around the world.
Worry-Free Warranty: Pruveeo has total confidence in our products and backs them with a 12-month replacement warranty. Our Official Site: bit.ly/2qNbtEn
